summary: Comprehensive testing of OmniHealth Guardian decentralized AI-IoT medical monitoring platform completed. Backend APIs working (32/33 tests passed), all three user dashboards functional with real-time features, AI integration working, and Moltbot activity tracking operational.

flaky_endpoints.symptoms: Returns 520 server error when recording new readings
flaky_endpoints.impact: Affects real-time data updates, but does not block dashboard functionality

integration_issues.issue: Session appears to reset when navigating directly to /patient URL, requiring re-authentication

passed_tests: Landing page loads with hero section and login form
Role selection tabs (Patient, Doctor, Organization) working
Patient profile dropdown populated with 10 patients
Doctor profile dropdown populated with 20 doctors
Organization form fields accepting input
Login flow redirects to appropriate dashboard based on role
Patient dashboard shows real-time vitals (heart rate 87 BPM, battery 11%)
Patient dashboard displays device status as 'Online'
Doctor dashboard shows live patient telemetry with 10 readings
Doctor dashboard displays patient condition distribution chart
Organization dashboard shows system stats (10 patients, 20 doctors, 30 hospitals)
Organization dashboard displays device distribution pie chart
Organization dashboard shows hospital deployment bar chart
System health metrics displayed (99.98% uptime, 124 active connections)
Moltbot activity feed showing AI actions and verifications
Moltbot sidebar opens with verified activity items
Backend API endpoints (32/33) returning correct data structure
Mock data generation working (10 patients, 20 doctors, 30 hospitals)
AI diet plan generation API functional
Blockchain transaction hashing simulation working
opBNB testnet explorer links functional
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix the /api/telemetry/reading POST endpoint that returns 520 server error. Consider improving session management for direct URL navigation to dashboard pages.

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (all major features working with minor session issue)
